entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
